tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (SBARQ (WHADVP (WRB How)) (SQ (MD could) (VP (VB ANYONE) (NP (NP (NN dislike) (NNP Bob) (NNP Dylan) (POS 's)) (NNP Christmas) (NN album)))) (. ?)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [ANYONE/VB advmod>How/WRB aux>could/MD dobj>[album/NN nmod:poss>[Dylan/NNP compound>dislike/NN compound>Bob/NNP case>'s/POS] compound>Christmas/NNP] punct>?/.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (S (VP (MD Must) (VP (VB Be) (NP (NNP Santa))))) (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VB bring) (NP (PRP me)) (ADVP (RB so) (RB much)) (NP-TMP (NN today)))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [bring/VB csubj>[Santa/NNP aux>Must/MD cop>Be/VB] aux>is/VBZ dobj>me/PRP advmod>[much/RB advmod>so/RB] nmod:tmod>today/NN punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NP (NNP Tis)) (NP (DT the) (NN season))) (SBAR (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB be) (ADVP (RB jolly)))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Tis/NNP dep>[season/NN det>the/DT] acl>[be/VB mark>to/TO advmod>jolly/RB] punct>!/.]
